hero.headline: A system made to carry your communication load
hero.subheadline: Not a bot. Not a tool. A Patient Communication Operating System

page1.headline: How the system works
page1.body:
AberoAI is designed around a single operational truth:

Patient communication should not depend on individuals.
It should depend on a governed, stable system that carries context, continuity, and responsibility by default.

This page shows:

What your team interacts with on the surface
(Pipeline 1: operational features)

What stabilizes your communication underneath
(Pipeline 2: system capabilities)

Two pipelines.
One coherent, governed communication system.

block1.headline: Unified Patient Inbox
block1.body:
Every message — WhatsApp, web chat, social channels — arrives in one coherent, governed flow

• Multi-channel consolidation
• Identity-aware threading
• Automatic conversation grouping
• Cross-channel continuity

block2.headline: WhatsApp Workflow Layer
block2.body:
Not quick replies.
Not bot menus.
But a structured workflow layer designed for clinics handling global volume

• Guided responses (context-aware)
• Document & media handling
• Triage-based routing
• Consistent tone across languages

block3.headline: Multilingual Intelligence Engine
block3.body:
Patients understand you — and your clinic understands them — regardless of language

• English, Turkish, Arabic, Russian, Spanish, French
• Healthcare-adapted tone
• Context-retaining phrasing
• No template feel

block4.headline: Follow-up Journey Flows
block4.body:
Built around real patient journeys — pre-treatment, post-treatment, recovery, and retention.

• Day-by-day check-ins
• Aftercare instructions
• Scheduled long-term signals
• Safety & reassurance touchpoints

block5.headline: Time-Zone & Department Routing
block5.body:
Patients reach the right person automatically — no matter where your team is located

• Time-zone aware distribution
• Language-based routing
• Department mapping
• Expertise-based workflow
block5.microline: Routing governed by logic, not guesswork

block6.headline: Message-Native CRM
block6.body:
A CRM built from conversations — not tickets, not forms

• Treatment timeline consolidation
• Files, photos, medical context
• Relationship history vault
• Conversation summaries
block6.microline: A memory layer, not a database

page10.body:
AberoAI enables:

• Coherent patient journeys
• Stable communication across time

• Trust that compounds over months, not minutes

Teams stop firefighting.
Patients stop feeling lost.
